about.paragraph1: Everything begins with the privilege of being Brazilian with the strength and resilience of a land defined by contrasts, exuberance, and contradiction. A country that fills the heart with pride because, even in the face of loss and challenge, we always find a way to welcome others. Leaving home is never easy.
about.paragraph2: Through every challenge and lesson, one thing has always stayed with me: love expressed through food. It was in each meal that I learned my mother's quiet strength and boundless care. Food has that power it brings us home, no matter how far we've gone.
about.paragraph3: When I cook, I find joy and purpose. Everything else fades into silence. Cooking is how I turn everyday life into magic it's what brought me out of dark places and back to life.
about.paragraph4: I didn't get here alone. It took many hands, many gestures of kindness, many stories intertwined with mine. That's why I dedicate myself to giving back spreading love and belonging through what I create. I believe simplicity is the essence of happiness, and from it comes my desire to share the warmth of a Brazilian backyard: the flavors, the gatherings, and the quiet beauty of the simple things that make our land so unique.

catering.title: Catering

service0.title: How it Works
service0.description: Our catering service is designed to bring warmth and comfort to your special occasions — making celebrations easier, cozier, and full of affection.

service2.title: Menu options
service2.description: Please get in touch one month in advance, so we can plan together the menu.
service2.description2: Our fixed menu items can also be included in your brunch, breakfast, or as desserts for catering events.

service3.title: Booking requirements
service3.description: At least one month in advance via email at:

catering.contactText: Interested in our catering services? Get in touch.

confirmation.title: Order Confirmed!
confirmation.message: Your order has been successfully placed. We will contact you shortly to confirm delivery details. You will receive an email confirmation at the address you provided.

productDescriptions.1: Brazilian chocolate cake covered with brigadeiro
productDescriptions.2: Traditional carrot cake with chocolate topping
productDescriptions.4: Sweet cornmeal cake, a Brazilian classic
productDescriptions.6: Classic vanilla cake with smooth frosting
productDescriptions.7: Moist red velvet with cream cheese
productDescriptions.8: Fresh strawberry cake with whipped cream
productDescriptions.9: Thin layers of guava rolled cake

productFullDescriptions.1: Our signature Brigadeiro Cake features layers of moist chocolate sponge covered with creamy brigadeiro (Brazilian chocolate truffle). A beloved Brazilian classic that melts in your mouth.
productFullDescriptions.2: Traditional Brazilian Bolo de Cenoura - a super moist carrot cake topped with rich chocolate ganache. Made with fresh carrots and pure chocolate.
productFullDescriptions.3: Prestígio Cake inspired by the famous Brazilian candy. Layers of chocolate cake with coconut cream filling, covered in chocolate ganache and shredded coconut.
productFullDescriptions.4: Traditional Bolo de Fubá - a sweet cornmeal cake with a tender crumb. Often enjoyed with coffee, this Brazilian classic is simple yet delicious.
productFullDescriptions.5: Decadent chocolate layer cake with rich chocolate buttercream frosting. Perfect for chocolate lovers, with moist layers and smooth filling.
productFullDescriptions.6: Classic vanilla birthday cake with light, fluffy layers and smooth vanilla buttercream. Can be customized with your choice of decorations and fillings.
productFullDescriptions.7: Moist red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting. Beautiful red layers with a hint of cocoa and tangy cream cheese topping.
productFullDescriptions.8: Fresh strawberry cake with whipped cream and strawberry filling. Light sponge layers with fresh fruit and airy cream.
productFullDescriptions.9: Traditional Bolo de Rolo from Pernambuco, Brazil. Thin layers of sponge rolled with guava paste, creating a beautiful spiral pattern.
productFullDescriptions.10: Tres Leches - sponge cake soaked in three types of milk (evaporated, condensed, and cream). Topped with whipped cream and cinnamon.
productFullDescriptions.11: Complete breakfast platter including cakes, sweet items, and beverages. Perfect for morning meetings or events.
productFullDescriptions.12: Assorted selection of savory and sweet items perfect for parties and gatherings.
productFullDescriptions.13: Beautiful assortment of our finest cakes and sweet treats. Great for celebrations.
productFullDescriptions.14: Full catering package with customizable options for your event. Contact us for details.
